name: 特殊教育論題
goals: 了解特殊教育的內涵、發展和意義Understanding the content, developmental and purpose of special education
了解特殊教育的分類、對象和其需求Understanding the classification of individuals with special needs, and their needs
了解各國特殊教育實施和趨勢Understanding the international trend and practice of special education
能夠因應問題閱讀特殊教育工作所需之文獻Able to search the reference and to read for the problem solving in special education
評估特殊學生的能力、特質、 工作能力Able to assess competence, traits, working competence.
探討資優的身心特質與教育意義Psychological and physiological traits of the gifted and their implications in education
分析創造力的評量與工具運用Analysis of assessment tools and application in measuring creativity
探討身心障礙者就業相關資源與介入Exploring employment related resources and services for persons with disabilities
認同因應特殊需求的專業工作Identifying the professionals for the individual with special needs.
syllabus:
本課程分三個主題進行，身心障礙教育、資賦優異教育和復健諮商進行。

The course is divided into three topics about special education for individual with disabilities, giftedness and talents, and rehabilitation counseling.

1.     課程介紹(身,資,復三位老師出席)

Introduction of the course

2.     特殊教育概念：身心障礙、資賦優異、復健諮商(身)

   Introduction on special education: disabilities, giftedness and talent, rehabilitation

3.     資優教育法令與資優教育推動 (資)

Policy making and implementation of gifted and talented education

4.     各國及臺灣的身心障礙者就業相關政策(復)

International policy and local related to employment of persons with disabilities

5.     國際特殊教育歷史發展和身心障礙的分類系統(身)

International special education: history and current classification system of disabilities

6.     資優鑑定基準與弱勢群體發掘問題(資)

Effects of identification criteria on the discovery of disadvantaged minority students

7.     身心障礙者的職業重建服務系統(復)

Vocational rehabilitation service system for persons with disabilities

8.     國際特殊教育政策和台灣的特殊教育政策(身)

    International policy and local policy of the special education for students with disabilities

9.     優勢發展與弱勢補救: 衝突or互補(資)

Maximizing strengths and improving weakness: Conflicts or Complementary

10.  身心障礙者的生涯發展與諮商(復)

Career development and counselling of persons with disabilities

11.  身心障礙學生的評量和相關議題(身)

    Assessment for students with disabilities

12.  創造力領域特定性與評量議題(資)

  Domain-specific creativity and its assessment

13.  身心障礙者職業能力評量與職務再設計（復）

    Social participation and quality of life of persons with disabilities

14.  特殊教育之團隊工作者(身)

    Professionals in special education team work

15.資優的身心特質與教育意義(資)

    Psychological and physiological traits of the gifted and

their implications in education

15.  身心障礙者的社會參與生活品質(復)

Social participation of people with disabilities in quality of life

17\. 學校或機構參訪

   Schools or institutes visiting

18\. 期末評量

   Final exam

grading.note: School visiting report, quiz in class,參觀報告、隨堂作業

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
